lead_paragraph: A senior official of the Khyber tribal region said the attacker had detonated an explosive vest at a militia checkpoint just outside the northern city of Peshawar.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Pakistan: Explosion Kills 8 People at Checkpoint in Khyber Region
headline.main: Explosion, Said to Be Suicide Bombing, Kills 8 in Northwest Pakistan

snippet: A senior official of the Khyber tribal region said the attacker had detonated an explosive vest at a militia checkpoint just outside the northern city of Peshawar.
abstract: Reported suicide bombing at militia checkpoint outside Peshawar, Pakistan, kills eight people and wounds at least 11 others.
